textTemplates.name: ErrorMsgReferrerMissing
textTemplates.text:
You've noted that you're creating a Reference Lead. However, when trying to identify the referrer, we came up empty handed. If this result is unexpected, give this information to your administrator - we searched for the Record ID "{!c7b2c5c4-64d5-4a79-a37a-af28f5f20c6e.Id}" and found nothing.
Your Lead has not been created

textTemplates.name: ptDuplicateFoundCustomError
textTemplates.text:
Duplicate Detected


When trying to create your Lead, we found {!NumDuplicatesFound} duplicate(s).

The duplicate with the highest "matching score" had {!DuplicateMatchingScore}%. (This indicates the certainty of it being a duplicate).


Link to Duplicate


(If you cannot see this, it means that the duplicate is owned by another user - if you have additional questions, you can forward these to your manager.

variables.description: Holds either "Lead" or "Account" as a text value (Values must be literally "Lead" or "Account")
variables.name: ReferenceOriginObject
